images.copyright: An Australian koala perched in a gum tree overlooking the scenery (© juuce/Getty Images)
images.title: It’s Wild Koala Day!
images.caption: It’s Wild Koala Day!
images.desc: Today, on Wild Koala Day, we celebrate one of the most quintessentially Australian animals. Beloved not just by locals, but countless around the globe, the marsupial spends many a day napping and snacking on eucalyptus leaves. Started by a group of non-profit Koala-centric charities, Wild Koala Day is designed not only to celebrate the koala, but to also help raise awareness for the protection of their habitats.
